name: Un dernier chant
description:
Un Dernier Chant is a VR adventure game where you play as a sailor in a fantastic world. At the helm of your flying ship, you will encounter a whale that will take you into space. Between Clouds and Space 
  • Navigate through a aerial world in company of fishes, sharks and octopuses.
  • Find the great flying whale and try to hunt her or stay peacefull and enjoy the ride.
  • Maintain you ship in a good shape by using different elements of the cockpit
    •  such as the fire extinguisher or the hammer.
This game was made by a team of five French student from the school CNAM ENJMIN in the span of three months.
  • FANY PASSET : Game Design & VFX Artist LinkedIn
  • SIMON GIGANT : Programming Linkedin
  • DAMIEN DROUILLARD : Sound Design LinkedIn
  • QUENTIN DUPUIS : Game Artist LinkedIn
  • LUCAS BELAROUCI : Producer Linkedin
